column3: Your English teacher calls on you to answer a question about the book you just read. You say your best answer and your peers are quiet.
column4: You have a science test next week that's going to count for a lot of your grade. You haven't understood this unit's course material that well and you wonder how the test is going to go.
column5: You go to your grandparents' home for the first time in a while and notice that your grandfather looks a lot less healthy than you remember. No one in your family mentions it.
